metadata.title: 'Big Short' investor Burry targets AI boom with new blog after hedge fund closure
metadata.description: By Shashwat Chauhan        "The Big Short" investor Michael Burry, a vocal skeptic of the current AI boom, took aim at Nvidia as he launched a paid Substack newsletter focused on financial markets, days after shutting down his hedge fund.
